title: I got stuck at begin the game
body:
I got stuck at begin the game. I couldnt do anything. Couldnt Exit or Atl+tab or Click Windown button except hold the Power button for restart the Computer. I reinstalled the window 10. I can do anything normal with the computer only when I lauch the game -> play game -> pick champion -> and it stucked at begin the game. I need to restart everytime. Can someone help me Fix this problem. :( 
Thanks

replies.body: Have you recently updated to Windows 10?  This freezing issue may be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) not interacting with league properly.  Disabling this should fix it!
